title: Tips for Tax-Smart and Effective Charitable Giving
description: Inequality editor Meera Jagannathan and Deputy Personal Finance Editor Leslie Albrecht discuss how to maximize your impact when donating to nonprofits this giving season, no matter what your budget is.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
